welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Luce, Slovenia! Prepare to be enchanted by our charming city, known for its natural beauty and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brnik Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Brnik Airport is responsible for all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's wifi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alpe Adria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
